dependencies.description:
FreeGLUT is a free-software/open-source alternative to the OpenGL
Utility Toolkit (GLUT) library
dependencies.name: freeglut

dependencies.description: This package provides the Mesa OpenGL Utility library.
dependencies.name: glu

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.
dependencies.name: qt

dependent_to.description:
g2o is an open-source C++ framework for optimizing graph-based nonlinear
error functions. g2o has been designed to be easily extensible to a wide
range of problems and a new problem typically can be specified in a few
lines of code. The current implementation provides solutions to several
variants of SLAM and BA.
dependent_to.name: g2o

dependent_to.description: Yade is an free software for particle based simulations.
dependent_to.name: yade

description:
libQGLViewer is a C++ library based on Qt that eases the creation of
OpenGL 3D viewers.
name: libqglviewer

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
